title: miri error in safe code when mutating the bool inside Option<RefCell<bool>>

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: I-unsound
labels.description: Issue: A soundness hole (worst kind of bug), see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soundness

body:
Running this code in miri(2019-12-27) in the playground:
```rust
use std::cell::RefCell;

fn main() {
    let optional=Some(RefCell::new(false));
    let mut handle=optional.as_ref().unwrap().borrow_mut();
    optional.is_some();
    *handle=true;
}
```
https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=stable&mode=debug&edition=2018&gist=3e8c5326890889354418d3161294d0fe
